article: the jackson hits that helped shape an era of blockbuster pop -- especially ballads such as `` man in the mirror '' and `` you are not alone , '' which are close in spirit to the newly released `` this is it '' -- were scorned by many critics as saccharine , overly smooth and sometimes grandiose .
